commit message: Long pressing an app entry in the main activity now opens the system's 'App info' screen. Moved the 'App Details' dialog to the annotations activity.
BUGFIX: Make sure the progressbar is always showing when the device is scanned.
BUGFIX: Added a safety catch to prevent lists become large enough to crash the transfer buffer (and hence the device).
Reverted versionnumber.  It was already bumped.
The clipboard can handle a bigger payload -> Moved the size check.
